| icon           = poe2 velune icon.png
| description    = Velune's namesake is a yellow-orange fruit found in Old Vailia. These clear gemstones bear a similar yellow-orange color and are often cut like rubies, sapphires, and emeralds. Most of the world's known Velune mines have long since dried up, and the stone has become one of the most sought after in recent years.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Unequippable

| location       = * [Serpent's Crown](/serpentsCrown/): Sold by [Una](/una/) in the daytime.
* [Dunnage](/dunnage/), [Radiant Court](/radiantCourt/): Sold by [Dimesa](/dimesa/) in [The Treasure Trove](/theTreasureTrove/).
* Can be looted from dead [Giant cave grub](/giantCaveGrub/).
* Can be looted from dead [Engwithan saint](/engwithanSaint/)s.
| guid           =8d94986f-66cd-4b0d-8e30-e2c58aa574fe
